players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I am shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden death. We must find out who did this and bring them to justice."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Diana: "I had nothing to do with Alice's death. I was only silent during the day because I didn't want to reveal my role as mafioso yet."
You: "I believe Charlie's accusations against Diana are unfounded. The fact that he repeated himself so insistently raises suspicions about his own involvement in Alice's death."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
